title: Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons          Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site Visitor Center NPS Photo   Â    Little Rock Central High School National Historic Site Visitor Center 2120 W Daisy L Gatson Bates Dr Little Rock, AR 72202 Map Open Daily 9:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. CST Monday - Sunday throughout the year Except for these Holidays: December 31, 2015 - Open 9 AM.  Closing at 2:30 PM Closed January 1, 2016. In cases of inclement weather, please call ahead to confirm (501) 374-1957 or check Little Rock area news stations for closing or altered hours announcements. If federal offices are closed, that includes this National Park Visitor Center.  If Little Rock School District is closed, previously scheduled walking tours that go into Central High will be cancelled. Happy to be a "Fee Free Park"!
